mapper.select: SELECT FROM dbo.videos as video WHERE video.videoStatus = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT FROM dbo.videos as video LEFT JOIN dbo.rentals as rental ON video.videoId = rental.rentalVideoID WHERE video.videoId NOT IN (SELECT FROM dbo.rentals as rental JOIN dbo.videos as video ON rental.rentalVideoId = video.videoId WHERE rental.returnedDate IS NULL)
SELECT FROM dbo.videos as video WHERE video.title LIKE '%'|| ${title} ||'%' AND video.genre = #{genre}
SELECT FROM dbo.videos as video INNER JOIN dbo.rentalTypes as rentalType ON video.videoRentalTypeId = rentalType.rentalTypeId WHERE rentalType.name = #{rentalTypeName}
mapper.update: UPDATE dbo.videos SET title = #{title}, genre = #{genre}, year = #{year}, videoStatus = #{videoStatus}, videoRentalTypeId = #{videoRentalTypeId} WHERE videoId = #{videoId}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM dbo.rentals AS rental WHERE rental.rentalVideoId = #{videoId} ORDER BY rental.rentalDate DESC
